mapper.select: SELECT F.FOUND_IDX AS foundIdx, F.EMAIL AS email, F.FOUND_TITLE AS foundTitle, F.FOUND_CONTENT AS foundContent, F.FOUND_DATE AS foundDate, F.F_REG_DATE AS fRegDate, F.F_VIEWS AS fViews, F.ITEM_STATE AS itemState, F.LOCATION_CODE AS locationCode, F.F_LOCATION_DETAIL AS fLocationDetail, F.ITEM_CODE AS itemCode, F.F_ITEM_DETAIL AS fItemDetail, F.COLOR_CODE AS colorCode, F.FOUND_STATE AS foundState, I.ITEM AS itemName, C.COLOR_NAME AS colorName, L.SIDO_NAME AS sidoName, L.GUGUN_NAME AS gugunName FROM FOUND F LEFT JOIN ITEMS I ON F.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN COLORS C ON F.COLOR_CODE = C.COLOR_CODE LEFT JOIN LOCATIONS L ON F.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE WHERE F.FOUND_IDX = #{foundIdx}
